root.message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 14-3-1, translated into en
root.data: National data sets should be reported annually (at the least), following the request by IOC Circular letters. However, experts, national focal points of Member States and NODCs are invited to submit data throughout the year via the SDG 14.3.1 data portal. The next invitation via a Circular Letter will be send in during the second semester of 2021.
